Offer ID.description: ID of the offer, same value as the id field in the product feed. This is the merchant-side ID of the product.

Category ID.description: ID of the product category, foreign key to the product_categories dimension.

Category Name.description: The name associated with the Category ID.

Product Type.description: The merchants own product category string, same value as the product type field in the product feed.

Brand.description: Brand of the offer, same value as the brand field in the product feed.

Offer Group ID.description: The id of the leaf product group node that won the auction.

Product ID.description: The id of the product. This is the Yahoo-side ID given to the product.

Custom Label 0.description: One of 5 different custom labels that can be applied to a Product.

Custom Label 1.description: One of 5 different custom labels that can be applied to a Product.

Custom Label 2.description: One of 5 different custom labels that can be applied to a Product.

Custom Label 3.description: One of 5 different custom labels that can be applied to a Product.

Custom Label 4.description: One of 5 different custom labels that can be applied to a Product.

Source.description: Source=1 represents native traffic. Source=2 represents search traffic.

Device Type.description: Device type of the user: Desktop, Tablet, Phone, Unknown.

Month.description: Month will be represented as the first day of the month in YYYY-MM-DD format.

Week.description: Week will be represented as the first day of the week in YYYY-MM-DD format.

Day.description: The date in in YYYY-MM-DD format.

Post View Conversions.description: The total number of post view conversions.

Post Click Conversions.description: The total number of post click conversions.
